description:
Blue is the grandson of the great Professor Oak. In the Kanto based games, he is the player (Red, Green, or Leaf`s) rival. He becomes the Kanto champion as well until you defeat him. In the Johto based games and Let`s Go, he has become the Viridian City Gym Leader after being defeated by Red and taking Giovanni`s place. In the Unova based games, he`s still the Gym Leader of Viridian City, but participates as a former Champion. In the Alola based games, he`s considered a legend upon legends, and is the oldest he`s ever been.
Blue is Red`s rival in Pokemon Origins and Generations. He is also what Gary Oak is based off of.
name: Green Ookido
